analysis.description:
Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/20/0xf4f5683bc45bb1b3a3c61bb458006682d29d08a5.sol#105-106:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/20/0xf4f5683bc45bb1b3a3c61bb458006682d29d08a5.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.15 (/unique_chucks/20/0xf4f5683bc45bb1b3a3c61bb458006682d29d08a5.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_a' of Slotthereum.getNumber (/unique_chucks/20/0xf4f5683bc45bb1b3a3c61bb458006682d29d08a5.sol#107) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_minBetAmount' of Slotthereum.setMinBetAmount (/unique_chucks/20/0xf4f5683bc45bb1b3a3c61bb458006682d29d08a5.sol#177) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_maxBetAmount' of Slotthereum.setMaxBetAmount (/unique_chucks/20/0xf4f5683bc45bb1b3a3c61bb458006682d29d08a5.sol#183) is not in mixedCase
